DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : CORFU ; EU SEEKS PRESIDENT
DOC.TEXT: Leaders of the 12 European Union nations convene on this Greek island Thursday and Friday to choose a successor to Jacques Delors as president of the EU ' s powerful executive commission.There is already talk_of a possible deadlock at the meeting , the EU ' s semiannual summit . Delors ' second five-year term expires at the end of the year , so if no successor is chosen at Corfu a special summit may be required in the fall . Meanwhile , Russian President Boris N . Yeltsin will come_to Corfu to sign a trade agreement with the European Union . The accord is considered an important link binding Russia with the West .
